front.title: IEEE Standard for Local and metropolitan area networks -- Bridges and Bridged Networks

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.keyword: Virtual Bridged Local Area Networks (virtual LANs)
front.abstract: Enhancements to the forwarding process that supports scheduled traffic is provided in this amendment to IEEE Std 802.1Q-2014. Additional downloads are attached or can be downloaded at http://standards.ieee.org/downloads/802.1/index.html)
